Room.Name: A Path from the Plains
Room.Description: You are on a path away from the Plains of Ofcol. The path doesn't look well tread, but it is relatively well kept. To the south are the Plains of Ofcol, while this path leads north.

Exit.Description: You see the Plains of Ofcol.

Room.Name: Along the Path
Room.Description: You are on the path away from the Plains of Ofcol. The main path leads north to an overlook and south back toward the Plains of Ofcol. Western and eastern side paths can be seen, probably deer trails by the width of them.

Exit.Description: You see the path back toward Ofcol.

Room.Name: A Small Trail
Room.Description: This small deer trail leads north and east.

Exit.Description: The main path is to the east.
A large battlefield stretches off to the west.

Room.Name: A Small Trail
Room.Description: This small deer trail leads north and west.

Exit.Description: The main path is to the west.

Room.Name: The Overlook
Room.Description: You are above a large valley. Below you, you see humanoid forms wandering around the valley. Rich green grass covers the valley, with some small trees dotting the landscape. To the south is the trail back toward Ofcol.

Exit.Description: You see the path back toward Ofcol.
You see the entrance to the valley.

Room.Name: The Entrance to the Valley of the Elves
Room.Description: You are at the entrance to the Valley of the Elves. Elves stare at your intrusion, but most are too busy to bother with you. The valley spreads to the north, while enlarging toward the east and west.

Room.Name: The Edge of the Valley
Room.Description: You are at the edge of the Valley of the Elves. High above you, you see a small trail circling the entire valley. The valley continues north and east.

Exit.Description: The entrance to the valley is to the east.

Room.Name: The Edge of the Valley
Room.Description: You are at the edge of the Valley of the Elves. High above you, you see a small trail circling the entire valley. The valley continues north and west.

Exit.Description: The entrance to the valley is to the west.

Room.Name: The Edge of the Valley
Room.Description: You are at the edge of the Valley of the Elves. High above you, you see a small trail circling the entire valley. The valley continues north and east.

Room.Name: The Valley of the Elves
Room.Description: You are in the Valley of the Elves. The valley continues in all directions.

Room.Name: The Valley of the Elves
Room.Description: You are in the Valley of the Elves. The valley continues in all directions. The entrance to the valley is towards the south.

Exit.Description: You see the entrance to the valley.

Room.Name: The Valley of the Elves
Room.Description: You are in the Valley of the Elves. The valley continues in all directions.

Room.Name: The Edge of the Valley
Room.Description: You are at the edge of the Valley of the Elves. High above you, you see a small trail circling the entire valley. The valley continues north and west.

Room.Name: The Edge of the Valley
Room.Description: You are at the edge of the Valley of the Elves. A steep trail leads up toward the deer trail circling the valley. The valley continues north, south, and east.

Room.Name: The Valley of the Elves
Room.Description: You are in the Valley of the Elves. The valley continues in all directions.

Room.Name: The Valley of the Elves
Room.Description: You are in the Valley of the Elves. The valley continues in all directions.

Room.Name: The Valley of the Elves
Room.Description: You are in the Valley of the Elves. The valley continues in all directions.

Room.Name: The Edge of the Valley
Room.Description: You are at the edge of the Valley of the Elves. A steep trail leads up toward the deer trail circling the valley. The valley continues north, south, and west.

Room.Name: The Edge of the Valley
Room.Description: You are at the edge of the Valley of the Elves. High above you, you see a small trail circling the entire valley. The valley continues south and east.

Room.Name: The Valley of the Elves
Room.Description: You are in the Valley of the Elves. The valley continues in all directions.

Room.Name: The Valley of the Elves
Room.Description: You are in the Valley of the Elves. The valley continues in all directions.

Room.Name: The Valley of the Elves
Room.Description: You are in the Valley of the Elves. The valley continues in all directions.

Room.Name: The Edge of the Valley
Room.Description: You are at the edge of the Valley of the Elves. High above you, you see a small trail circling the entire valley. The valley continues south and west.

Room.Name: The Edge of the Valley
Room.Description: You are at the edge of the Valley of the Elves. High above you, you see a small trail circling the entire valley. The valley continues south and east.

Room.Name: The Edge of the Valley
Room.Description: You are in the Valley of the Elves. The valley continues in all directions. To the north, a small, narrow trail leads away from the valley.

Exit.Description: A small trail leads away from the valley.

Room.Name: The Edge of the Valley
Room.Description: You are at the edge of the Valley of the Elves. High above you, you see a small trail circling the entire valley. The valley continues south and west.

Room.Name: A Trail Leading from the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail leading away from the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads north and south. A rope ladder leads up to a rope bridge.

Exit.Description: The trail leads back to the valley.
You see the rope bridge above you.

Room.Name: Along the Trail
Room.Description: You are on the trail away from the Valley of the Elves. The hills around you keep this trail narrow. The trail continues east, south, and west.

Exit.Description: The trail continues south back toward the valley.

Room.Name: A Bend in the Trail
Room.Description: You are on the trail away from the Valley of the Elves. The hills around you keep this trail narrow. The trail continues north and back west.

Exit.Description: You see a small valley north.
The trail goes back to the west.

Room.Name: A Smaller Valley
Room.Description: You are in another valley within these hills. To the north, you can see a building, and to the south you see the trail away from this valley. The west and east paths surround this building.

Exit.Description: You see the trail around the building.
You see the trail leading away from this valley.
You see the trail around the building.

Room.Name: A Trail in the Valley
Room.Description: You are on the trail in the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads north and east. To the north-east is a building.

Room.Name: A Trail in the Valley
Room.Description: You are on the trail in the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads west and east. To the north is a building.

Room.Name: A Trail in the Valley
Room.Description: You are on the trail in the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads north and south. To the east is a building.

Room.Name: A Trail in the Valley
Room.Description: You are on the trail in the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads north and west. To the north-west is a building.

Room.Name: The Elf Home
Room.Description: You are in the home of the valley elves. The building continues to the north and the east, and the exit is to the south.

Exit.Description: The building continues to the north.
The building continues to the east.
The exit is to the south.

Room.Name: The Kitchen
Room.Description: You are in a community kitchen for this valley elven home. Pots and pans line the walls, along with shelves filled with many foodstuffs. A big oven is to one side, and you can smell elfcakes being baked. There is a doorway to the north and one to the west.

Exit.Description: The building continues to the north.
The building continues to the west.

Room.Name: A Trail in the Valley
Room.Description: You are on the trail in the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads north and south. To the west is a building.

Room.Name: A Trail in the Valley
Room.Description: You are on the trail in the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads north and south. To the east is a building.

Room.Name: The Living Room
Room.Description: You are in the living room of the elven home. Mats cover the floor, and a on a table is a bowl full of fruits. Through the window you can see the valley, with its wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Exit.Description: The building continues to the east.
The entrance is to the south.

Room.Name: The Storage Room
Room.Description: You are in the storage room of the elven home. Sacks of flour cover one side, and cleaning accessories cover the other side. You find nothing of use here. A staircase leads up.

Exit.Description: The building continues to the south.
The building continues to the west.

Room.Name: A Trail in the Valley
Room.Description: You are on the trail in the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads north and south. To the west is a building.

Room.Name: A Trail in the Valley
Room.Description: You are on the trail in the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads south and east. To the south-east is a building.

Room.Name: A Trail in the Valley
Room.Description: You are on the trail in the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads west and east. To the south is a building.

Room.Name: A Trail in the Valley
Room.Description: You are on the trail in the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads east and west. To the south is a building.

Room.Name: A Trail in the Valley
Room.Description: You are on the trail in the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads south and west. To the south-west is a building.

Room.Name: The Elders' Room
Room.Description: You are in the room of the valley elf elders. Books written in strange languages line the numerous shelves, and scrolls cover a table. There is a smooth spheric object in the center of the room.

Room.Name: The Storage Room
Room.Description: You are in a storage room. Many useless (to you) items fill this room.

Room.Name: The Sleeping Quarters
Room.Description: You are in the sleeping quarters of the valley elves. Cots line the floor, with two windows showing a view of the valley. Books in strange languages line the shelves, but nothing of interest is here.

Room.Name: Study
Room.Description: You are in the study room of the valley elves. Comfortable mats are on the floor, and musical instruments are neatly stacked on shelves. Books in strange languages line some other elves. A stairway leads down to the first floor.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses. A safe trail leads down into the valley.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: On the Rope Bridge
Room.Description: You are on the rope bridge. From here, you can see the whole Valley of the Elves. To the south, you see the main valley. To the north-east, you see a smaller valley with a building in the center of it. To the north-west, you can see a very small valley with a shack in it's center. A rope ladder leads down into a trail.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses. A safe trail leads down into the valley.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

Room.Name: A Bend in the Trail
Room.Description: You are on a bend in the trail leading from the main valley. The hills around you make this trail quite narrow.

Room.Name: A Bend in the Trail
Room.Description: You are on a bend in the trail leading from the main valley. The hills around you make this trail quite narrow. To the west, you can see an even smaller valley, with looks like a small shack in the center of it.

Exit.Description: The entrance to the small valley is to the west.

Room.Name: The Small Valley
Room.Description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. The exit from this valley is to the east, and the entrance to the shack is to the west.

Exit.Description: The valley continues to the north.
The exit from this small valley is to the east.
The valley continues to the south.

Room.Name: The Small Valley
Room.Description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the south-west is a small shack.

Exit.Description: The valley continues to the south.
The valley continues to the west.

Room.Name: The Small Valley
Room.Description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the north-west is a small shack.

Exit.Description: The valley continues to the north.
The valley continues to the west.

Room.Name: The Small Valley
Room.Description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the south is a small shack.

Exit.Description: The valley continues to the east.
The valley continues to the west.

Room.Name: The Small Valley
Room.Description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the south-east is a small shack.

Exit.Description: The valley continues to the east.
The valley continues to the south.

Room.Name: The Small Valley
Room.Description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the east is a small shack.

Exit.Description: The valley continues to the north.
The valley continues to the south.

Room.Name: The Small Valley
Room.Description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the north-east is a small shack.

Exit.Description: The valley continues to the north.
The valley continues to the east.

Room.Name: The Small Valley
Room.Description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the north is a small shack.

Exit.Description: The valley continues to the east.
The valley continues to the west.

Room.Name: Inside the Small Shack
Room.Description: You are inside the small shack. A small stove is on the side, with soup cooking over it. You see nothing valuable.

Room.Name: Beneath the Small Shack
Room.Description: You are beneath the small shack, in a tunnel that leads south. It feels quite warm down here.

Exit.Description: The room looks reddish down there.

Room.Name: The Den of the Pyrohydra
Room.Description: You are in the den of the pyrohydra. All the walls are charred, and this room is filled with a smell close to that of burning tar.

Exit.Description: You see the relative safety to the north.
You see breaks in the charred rock to the east.
You see a door to the west.

Room.Name: The Workroom
Room.Description: This room looks like it is used for magical studies. Potions bubble over burners, and the whole room spells of herbs and dead animal flesh. A furnace to the side casts a bright light in this room. The whole room radiates with a magical aura.

Room.Name: The Storage Room
Room.Description: This room is used to store scrolls, potions, and other magical items. The whole room radiates with a magical aura.

Room.Name: WAY Far Down into the Valley
Room.Description: You have fallen trying to go down this steep hill. Maybe that wasn't that good an idea, huh? You've fallen, and you can't get up!

NPC.name: oldstyle dog cooshee
NPC.description: A beast is the size of the largest common dog. It has a greenish coat with brown spots. Its shape, along with its colors, make this cooshee almost undetectable as it moves.
NPC.longDescription: A rather large dog is here, wandering the valley.

NPC.name: oldstyle elf valley
NPC.description: This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and agile. You see hatred in his eyes, and you try to avoid his stare. His tense body looks ready to spring upon you, like a mountain lion stalking its prey. He sees you noticing him, and quietly disappears.
NPC.longDescription: A valley elf wanders here, cautious of your intrusion.

NPC.name: oldstyle elf valley
NPC.description: This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile. She glares at you, then quickly disappears before you see more of her.
NPC.longDescription: A female valley elf wanders here, skirting between the tall grasses.

NPC.name: oldstyle elf sentry valley
NPC.description: This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile. He glares at your intrusion and attacks with menace.
NPC.longDescription: A valley elf sentry stands here, then noticing you, gives you a cautious glance.

NPC.name: oldstyle elf sentry valley
NPC.description: This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile. She glares at your intrusion and attacks with menace.
NPC.longDescription: A valley elf sentry stands here, then noticing you, attacks quickly!

NPC.name: oldstyle elf scout valley
NPC.description: The elf notices your intrusion and attacks with determination.
NPC.longDescription: A valley elf scout wanders the valley, searching for intruders like you!

NPC.name: oldstyle elf valley
NPC.description: She is currently doing some menial chores, and ignores your intrusion except when you are in her way.
NPC.longDescription: A valley elf is here, doing her duties.

NPC.name: oldstyle elf elder valley
NPC.description: This elf looks quite old, probably twenty or more times your age. He looks quite potent, though.
NPC.longDescription: A valley elf elder is here, studying. He notices you. A valley elf elder shouts 'You have intruded wrongly. Be prepared to die! '
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Cleric AssistRace

NPC.name: oldstyle elf elder valley
NPC.description: This elf looks quite old, probably twenty or more times your age. She looks quite potent, though.
NPC.longDescription: A valley elf elder is here, studying. She notices you. A valley elf elder says 'Your arrogance will be your end, human. '
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Mage AssistRace

NPC.name: oldstyle pyrohydra pyro hydra
NPC.description: This big beast looks like a small red dragon, but has many more heads than a regular dragon, too. It doesn't look happy.
NPC.longDescription: A big beast with many heads, each breathing fire, stares at you with malice.

NPC.name: oldstyle hermit man old
NPC.longDescription: An old hermit sits here, smoking a pipe.

NPC.name: oldstyle talemon wizard mage
NPC.description: Talemon looks harmless, but the fireballs he throws at you don't.
NPC.longDescription: An old mage busies himself with some chemicals.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle guardian daemon
NPC.description: This daemon is unhappy with its summoned job, and is willing to take out it's anger at you!
NPC.longDescription: A huge guardian daemon is here, watching the treasure.

NPC.name: oldstyle wolf
NPC.description: The wolf is covered with brown hair. It looks at you with fright.
NPC.longDescription: A wolf is here, looking for small prey.

NPC.name: oldstyle antelope
NPC.description: With horns and spots over coarse, brown hair, this beast is the spit and image of ... An antelope.
NPC.longDescription: An antelope is here, peacefully munching on grass.

Item.Name: chainmail elven chain mail
Item.LongDescription: A shiny metallic shirt is on the floor.

Item.Name: boots elven
Item.LongDescription: Some soft boots are on the floor.

Item.Name: longsword elven sword long
Item.LongDescription: A shiny blade is on the floor.

Item.Name: cloak brown
Item.LongDescription: A pile of brown cloth is on the floor.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A shiny key is on the floor.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A shiny key is on the floor.

Item.Name: ring gold
Item.LongDescription: A shiny ring is on the floor.

Item.Name: quarterstaff staff two-handed
Item.LongDescription: A quarterstaff is on the floor.

Item.Name: potion
Item.LongDescription: A potion is on the floor.

Item.Name: potion
Item.LongDescription: A potion is on the floor.

Item.LongDescription: A potion is on the floor.

Item.LongDescription: A scroll is on the floor.

Item.Name: scroll
Item.LongDescription: A scroll is on the floor.

Item.Name: scroll
Item.LongDescription: A scroll is on the floor.

Item.Name: rod light
Item.LongDescription: A dull iron shaft is on the floor.

Item.Name: quarterstaff staff two-handed
Item.LongDescription: A quarterstaff is on the floor.
